list_definition.definition: a number of persons or things gathered together

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: A crowd of people gathered in the street.

list_definition.definition: a group of friends, usually known to one another

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: John’s friends are a nice crowd.

list_definition.definition: to gather in a large group

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They crowded round the injured motorcyclist.

list_definition.definition: to fill too full by coming together in
